description: This file contains the implementation of utility functions for the SLAP (Service Logic Aggregation Plane) object proxy, specifically managing object descriptors. It includes the function SlapOpoSetObjDescriptor, which configures the object state by allocating, freeing, and cloning object descriptors.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOpoSetObjDescriptor(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hObjDescriptor)
methods.description: Configures the object state by replacing the current object descriptor with a new one, involving memory management and cloning procedures.
